title: 10 Cent 4BHK Villa in Gandhinagar 4100 sqft
description:
Spacious 4BHK villa available for sale in a peaceful and prime residential pocket of Gandhinagar. Set on 10 cents of land with a generous built-up area of 4100 sq.ft, this home is thoughtfully laid out for comfort and practicality.

Key Features:

- 4 Large Bedrooms

- 4.5 Bathrooms

-Seperate TV room, which later can be converted to Bedroom

- Separate Living Room & Family Lounge

- Dining Area, Kitchen & Dedicated Work Area

- Quality Truss Roofing Work

- Well-kept interiors

- Calm, silent residential neighborhood

- Ample space for car parking

- Asking Price: ₹3.25 Crores (Negotiable)

The home has been maintained with care and attention, offering immediate move-in readiness without compromise on space or privacy. Ideal for families looking for a solid, spacious residence in a sought-after location.

Serious enquiries only.

Brokers excuse
